definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)
to reveal the cloven foot (idiom); to unmask one's true nature/to give the game away
to appear/to come out in the open

sentences.english: You know who's the reason for this big smile on my face?
sentences.chinese: 你知道我脸上绽露出的笑容，原因是什么吗？

sentences.english: They looked upon the creature with a loathing undisguised.
sentences.chinese: 他们流露出明显的厌恶看那动物。

sentences.english: Suspicion chased itself across his face.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸上露出怀疑的神色。

sentences.english: An insistently disapproving expression came upon her face.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上立刻露出了不同意的表情。

sentences.english: Diazinon and chlorpyrifos, too, were eventually revealed to be hazardous.
sentences.chinese: 二嗪农和毒死蜱也逐渐显露出危险性。

sentences.english: The exchange of words between the man and woman shows a lot about them.
sentences.chinese: 这位女士和这位男士间的对话表露出许多信息。

sentences.english: Parliamentary debate would supposedly give the game away.
sentences.chinese: 议会辩论可能会露出马脚。

sentences.english: His eyes gleamed with relief and joy.
sentences.chinese: 他两眼露出宽慰和喜悦的光芒。

sentences.english: Lisette 's large red mouth broke into a most alluring smile.
sentences.chinese: 莉莎特的鲜红的大嘴露出了一副极为诱人的微笑。

sentences.english: Joe Cole on the new owner reveals his adulation.
sentences.chinese: 乔科尔对新东家流露出崇拜之情。

sentences.english: Last wax the incapability is over-weight and keep penetration beaded paint from peeping out ground colour.
sentences.chinese: 上蜡时不能过重，防止穿透油漆露出底色。

sentences.english: A portiere at the farther side showed the entrance to the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 远处那边的一个门帷露出了通往卧室的进口。

sentences.english: They are usually round with short wing covers (elytra) that expose the end of the abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 虫体一般呈圆形，鞘翅短，腹部末端露出。

sentences.english: Also reveal an a few problems at the same time. 1 .
sentences.chinese: 同时也暴露出一些问题。

sentences.chinese: 小丫头露出顽皮的笑靥。
我不能把恐惧显露出来。

to appear/to come out in the open
